// Player sequence of SFX DragonTransform

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}

PlaySound: Sound=2595

	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default

// Player sequence of SFX for Chilling Slash

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

    ActivateReflect

    StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True

    EndThread
    PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
    Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
    WaitTurn: Char=CasterP
EndThread

// Player sequence of SFX Mikoto Attack

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
LoadSFX: SFX=Throw_Disc

StartThread
	Wait: Time=4
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Throw_Disc
	PlaySFX: SFX=Throw_Disc
	PlaySound: Sound=WeaponAttack
	StartThread: Condition=!IsAttackMiss
		PlaySound: Sound=WeaponHit
	EndThread
	Wait: Time=4
	WaitSFXDone: SFX=Throw_Disc
EndThread

	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Anim=MP_BACK
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=2
	WaitMove: Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

// Player sequence of Kuja's attack

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_1}
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=10
ElseThread: Sync=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Offset=(0.0, 0.0, 800) ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=0
EndThread

PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}; Loop=True

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySound: Sound=WeaponAttack
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}
EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
StartThread
	Wait: Time=10
	EffectPoint: Char=Everyone ; Type=Figure
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsAttackMiss
	PlaySound: Sound=WeaponHit
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=4
ElseThread: Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
EndThread
WaitTurn: Char=Caster
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}

StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True

	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True

		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread

for Gwahaha!.label: PlayerSequence
for Gwahaha!.body:
// Player sequence of SFX for Gwahaha!
// Make it randomly miss 50% of the time

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=GetRandom(0, 100) < 50 ; Sync

	SetupReflect
    PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_1}
	Wait: Time=4
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True
	PlaySound: Sound=726 ; Volume=1 ; Once=False
    WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
    PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
    WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
    PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}
	Wait: Time=5
	PlaySound: Sound=677 ; Volume=1 ; Once=False
    WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
    PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}

ElseThread: Sync
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Angle=0 ; Time=1
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Time=11 ; Distance=1024
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}
	StartThread
		SetupReflect
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=5 ; Reflect=True
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
		WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	StartThread
		Wait: Time=6
		PlaySound: Sound=673
	EndThread
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=4
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; Time=4 ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; MoveHeight=true
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect

// Player sequence of Baku's attack

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=600 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_2}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=10
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=0 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_3}
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Offset=(0.0, 0.0, 1600) ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=0
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=400 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_4}
EndThread
WaitMove: Char=Caster
StartThread
	Wait: Time=7
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}
	EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
	PlaySound: Sound=WeaponAttack
	StartThread: Condition=!IsAttackMiss
		PlaySound: Sound=WeaponHit
	EndThread
	Wait: Time=4
	EffectPoint: Char=Everyone ; Type=Figure
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=4
	WaitMove: Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
EndThread
